verses.text: In the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* came this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to me; \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* and \w yokes|strong="H4133"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them upon thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*,\f + \fr 27.2 \ft saith…: or, hath the \+nd LORD\+nd* said\f*

And \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* which \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;

And \w command|strong="H6680"\w* them to \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto their \w masters|strong="H0113"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto your \w masters|strong="H0113"\w*;\f + \fr 27.4 \ft to say…: or, concerning their masters, saying\f*

I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* that \add are\add* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, by my \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and by my \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it unto whom it \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w meet|strong="H3474"\w* unto me.

And now have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* all these \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; and the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him also to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him.

And all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him, and his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, until the very \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: and then \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* themselves of him.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* and \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* which will not \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the same \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and that will not \w put|strong="H5414"\w* their \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* under the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, that \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* will I \w punish|strong="H6485"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and with the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and with the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, until I have \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* them by his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Therefore \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not ye to your \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, nor to your \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*, nor to your \w dreamers|strong="H2472"\w*, nor to your \w enchanters|strong="H6049"\w*, nor to your \w sorcerers|strong="H3786"\w*, which \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*:\f + \fr 27.9 \ft dreamers: Heb. dreams\f*

For they \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* unto you, to remove you \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from your \w land|strong="H0127"\w*; and that I should drive you \w out|strong="H5080"\w*, and ye should \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

But the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* their \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* under the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him, those will I let remain \w still|strong="H3240"\w* in their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they shall \w till|strong="H5647"\w* it, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

¶ I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* also to \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* according to all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H0935"\w* your \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* under the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

Why will ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, thou and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* against the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* that will not \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*?

Therefore \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: for they \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* unto you.

For I have not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, yet they \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; that I might drive you \w out|strong="H5080"\w*, and that ye might \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, ye, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto you.\f + \fr 27.15 \ft a lie: Heb. in a lie, or, lyingly\f*

Also I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and to all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not to the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of your \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall now \w shortly|strong="H4120"\w* be brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: for they \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* unto you.

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them; \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: wherefore should this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* be laid \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*?

But if they \add be\add* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and if the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* with them, let them now make \w intercession|strong="H6293"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, that the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* which are \w left|strong="H3498"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w go|strong="H0935"\w* not to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* concerning the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and concerning the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and concerning the \w bases|strong="H4350"\w*, and concerning the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*,

Which \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* not, when he carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and all the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

Yea, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, concerning the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

They shall be \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and there shall they be until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; then will I \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* them up, and \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* them to this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.
